query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( PROCEDURE = int8eq, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, COMMUTATOR = === )
CREATE OPERATOR !== ( PROCEDURE = int8ne, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, NEGATOR = ===, COMMUTATOR = !== )
SELECT  ctid, oprcom FROM    pg_catalog.pg_operator fk WHERE   oprcom != 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprcom)
SELECT  ctid, oprnegate FROM    pg_catalog.pg_operator fk WHERE   oprnegate != 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprnegate)
CREATE OPERATOR <| ( PROCEDURE = int8lt, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint )
CREATE OPERATOR |> ( PROCEDURE = int8gt, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, NEGATOR = <|, COMMUTATOR = <| )
